content:
Welcome, one and all, to Rivertown Mafia!

Mod:
diddin
Backup Mod:
Hoopla
Setup Reviewed By:
RichardGHP, Slaxx

Rivertown. Just another little town along the mighty blue wonder, a speck of life on the Earth. The people of Rivertown lived in peace, and they were a happy community. At least they were until the Mafia came into town. The first night, the town mayor was found face down in the same river they lived on, a single bullet in his brain. That was when the town decided to destroy the Mafia at any cost. They set up a makeshift noose off of the cliffs on the outskirts of town, each one of them with the fear they could be next.

Still Rollin' on the River

Rules of the River:

Behavior:
1. Play to your win condition or you will be modkilled.
2. Do not directly quote or screenshot your role PM. You are allowed to paraphrase. Direct quoting and the like is punishable by modkill.
3. Do not discuss ongoing games in this thread, and do not discuss this game in other threads. Violation will result in a strike, then a modkill.
4. This is a game. Be civil and no personal attacks. Profanity is acceptable, but not too much please. You will recieve one strike before you are modkilled for violation of this rule.
5. After you die, you may not post anything in the thread. There will be a quicktopic for dead players to discuss the game after they die.
6. Do NOT edit or delete your posts or you will be modkilled.
7. Do not post in huge or tiny text. Do not use any language other than English.
8. Blue is my color. Do not post in it or else.

The Day Phase:
1. Votes must be in bold or I will not count them. ex:
Vote: diddin

2. You must also bold unvotes. You do not need to unvote before you change your vote.
3. You may vote for a no lynch if you want, which only requires 50% of the players.
4. Make sure I know who you are talking about if you use nicknames.
5. Each day will have a 3 week time limit. The deadline may be extended, but only for replacements.
6. A lynch is reached after a majority of votes are on one player. During twilight, everyone may talk except for the lynched player.
7. Each Night will be 72 Hours long. Any action not sent to me by then will not be accepted.
8. If there is not a majority at deadline, there will be a no lynch.

Activity:
1. You will receive a prod if you have gone 48 hours without posting.
2. Your third prod will be a forced replacement. You will be force-replaced if you do not post 48 hours after receiving a prod.
3. Please notify me of any V/LA periods you may have.
4. If you think somebody is due for a prod, just let me know.

The other Stuff:
1. I am the mod your God. Anything I say goes.
2. I am not a perfect God. If I make a mistake, notify me either in thread in bold or by PM.
3. If you are modkilled, you lose. Good day sir.
4. This is my first time modding. Let me know how you think it went after the game ends!

You're just an average kinda guy who wants to help get rid of the bad guys. Your only powers are to vote for a lynch and talk.

You win when all threats to the town are dead and at least one townie is alive. Good luck!
Role PMs are going out soon. I will post when they are all out and confirmations can begin.

Thirdkoopa has been lynched! Flip, flavor, and modscene will come tomorrow, since it's almost midnight and all. The thread will be locked until then.

The town was restless. No matter how long it took, it seemed they were getting nowhere. The day started to feel like it was going on for, well, days. After a while, Thirdkoopa grew tired of it all. Giving up, he locked himself up in his room. At first, the town seemed to not care. But after a while, as they grew more restless, someone proposed the idea of lynching Thirdkoopa. A mob of townspeople swarmed his house. Sorasgoof kicked down the door and carried him to the cliffs. Furcolow tied the noose around his neck, and el simo threw him from the cliffs. As his neck snapped audibly, they all recognized that smell. Vanilla. Oops.

Thirdkoopa,
Vanilla Townie
, was lynched Day 1!


It is now Night 1. Those with QuickTopics may now post in them, and those with night actions may send them in. Day 2 begins Sunday, January 16, at 4:33 PM Central Time!

Sorasgoof was found in his bed, a single bullet in his brain and an empty gun at his side. Was it suicide or was there another party involved? A closer look revealed that there was nothing suspicious of him.

Cyberbob,

, was shot dead night 1!
Sorasgoof,
Vanilla Townie
, took a bullet to the brain night 1!
